attributes.action: Scrap the London Olympic 2012 Logo and launch an investigation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The currently proposed Olympic Logo is an ignominious incomprehensible Logo of 'Gold Medal Standard' Olympic incompetence. We the British public demand better. The money spent on the Logo believed to be in the order of £500,000.00 should be investigated by independant auditors against charges of profiteering. Meanwhile a campaign should be launched 'In search of a London Olympic Identity', perhaps backed by commercial TV.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
